page.title: 10Children's Days
page.content: When I get home I say "Hello"and ask if I can go and play with Richard. I go up to play with him and we help with the{silage}at his Dad's{farm, by pushing all the silage to the side of the silage pit and filling in the corners and dips with grass and pushing some of the grass up the pit. We use forks for this. At 6:00 I go home and have my tea.(M.M.) When I am home I go and get changed and watch the{T.V}I watch{"The Hulk", {"Dog tagnian", "The Egg Race", or {"Play School".}I have my tea and go to play out side and I come in at 9:50 and go to bed.(Y.E.)
